mapper.sql: select id, org_caseNo, certificate_no, phone, relation, phone_code, remark, seat, make_call_time, call_start_time, call_end_time, call_length, call_record_id, grade, name, call_status, org_id, import_batch_no, create_by, create_id, create_time from t_lc_collectionrecordimprot

select id, org_caseNo, certificate_no, phone, relation, phone_code, remark, seat, make_call_time, call_start_time, call_end_time, call_length, call_record_id, grade, name, call_status, org_id, import_batch_no, create_by, create_id, create_time from t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lc_collectionrecordimprot
id, org_caseNo, certificate_no, phone, relation, phone_code, remark, seat, call_start_time, call_end_time, call_length, call_record_id, grade, name, call_status, org_id, import_batch_no, create_by, create_id, create_time,
#{id}, #{orgCaseno}, #{certificateNo}, #{phone}, #{relation}, #{phoneCode}, #{remark}, #{seat}, #{callStartTime}, #{callEndTime}, #{callLength}, #{callRecordId}, #{grade}, #{name}, #{callStatus}, #{orgId}, #{importBatchNo}, #{createBy}, #{createId}, #{createTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from t_lc_collectionrecordimprot where id in
#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp (id, org_caseNo, certificate_no, phone, relation, remark, seat, make_call_time, call_start_time, call_end_time, call_length, call_record_id, grade, name, call_status, org_id, import_batch_no, create_by, create_id, create_time ) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.orgCaseNo}, #{item.certificateNo}, #{item.phone}, #{item.relation}, #{item.remark}, #{item.seat}, #{item.makeCallTime}, #{item.callStartTime}, #{item.callEndTime}, #{item.callLength}, #{item.callRecordId}, #{item.grade}, #{item.name}, #{item.callStatus}, #{item.orgId}, #{item.importBatchNo}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createId}, #{item.createTime} )
mapper.update: update t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp set is_exception = 1 where id = #{id}
update t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp set is_exception = 2 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_lc_call_record ( contact_name, phone, contact_relation, call_start_time, call_end_time, call_len, call_sign, call_result, call_radio, create_time, create_by, case_no, remark, type, agent_name, make_call_time ) SELECT name as contact_name, phone, (CASE relation WHEN '本人' THEN '1' WHEN '直系' THEN '2' WHEN '亲戚' THEN '3' WHEN '朋友' THEN '4' WHEN '父母' THEN '5' WHEN '配偶' THEN '6' WHEN '兄弟' THEN '7' WHEN '姐妹' THEN '8' WHEN '哥哥' THEN '9' WHEN '兄长' THEN '10' WHEN '弟弟' THEN '11' WHEN '姐姐' THEN '12' WHEN '妹妹' THEN '13' WHEN '家人' THEN '14' WHEN '老公' THEN '15' WHEN '老婆' THEN '16' WHEN '同事' THEN '17' ELSE '-1' END) as contact_relation, call_start_time, call_end_time, (call_length*1000) as call_len, (CASE call_status WHEN '已接听' THEN 'R01' WHEN '拒接' THEN 'JJ' WHEN '无法接通' THEN 'R02' WHEN '主叫号码不可用' THEN 'R03' WHEN '空号' THEN 'KH' WHEN '关机' THEN 'GJ' WHEN '占线' THEN 'ZX' WHEN '停机' THEN 'R04' WHEN '未接' THEN 'WRJT' WHEN '无人接听' THEN 'WRJT' WHEN '主叫欠费' THEN 'R05' WHEN '呼损' THEN 'R06' WHEN '黑名单' THEN 'R07' WHEN '线路盲区' THEN 'R08' ELSE call_status END) as call_sign, (CASE call_status WHEN 'R01' THEN '已接听' WHEN 'JJ' THEN '拒接' WHEN 'R02' THEN '无法接通' WHEN 'R03' THEN '主叫号码不可用' WHEN 'KH' THEN '空号' WHEN 'GJ' THEN '关机' WHEN 'ZX' THEN '占线' WHEN 'R04' THEN '停机' WHEN 'WRJT' THEN '未接' WHEN 'R05' THEN '主叫欠费' WHEN 'R06' THEN '呼损' WHEN 'R07' THEN '黑名单' WHEN 'R08' THEN '线路盲区' ELSE call_status END) as call_result, call_record_id as call_radio, create_time, create_id, org_caseNo as case_no, remark, 3, (CASE seat WHEN '-1' THEN '机器人' ELSE seat END) as seat, make_call_time FROM t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp where import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo} and is_exception = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE t_lc_duncase m, (SELECT tt.call_status, tt.call_sign, tt.call_start_time,tt.org_caseNo,tt.org_id from (SELECT t.call_status, (CASE t.call_status WHEN '已接听' THEN 'R01' WHEN '拒接' THEN 'JJ' WHEN '无法接通' THEN 'R02' WHEN '主叫号码不可用' THEN 'R03' WHEN '空号' THEN 'KH' WHEN '关机' THEN 'GJ' WHEN '占线' THEN 'ZX' WHEN '停机' THEN 'R04' WHEN '未接' THEN 'WRJT' WHEN '主叫欠费' THEN 'R05' WHEN '呼损' THEN 'R06' WHEN '黑名单' THEN 'R07' WHEN '线路盲区' THEN 'R08' ELSE t.call_status END) as call_sign, t.call_start_time, t.org_caseNo, t.org_id from t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp t WHERE t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo} and t.is_exception ='0' AND EXISTS( SELECT a.case_no from t_lc_duncase a WHERE a.case_no=t.org_caseNo and a.org_id=t.org_id and IFNULL(a.recently_follow_up_date,'0000-00-00 00:00:00') <= t.call_start_time) )tt) n SET m.call_sign = n.call_sign, m.call_sign_value = n.call_status, m.recently_follow_up_date = n.call_start_time WHERE m.org_id = n.org_id and m.case_no = n.org_caseNo

UPDATE t_lc_task m, (SELECT tt.call_status, tt.call_sign, tt.call_start_time,tt.org_caseNo,tt.org_id from (SELECT t.call_status, (CASE t.call_status WHEN '已接听' THEN 'R01' WHEN '拒接' THEN 'JJ' WHEN '无法接通' THEN 'R02' WHEN '主叫号码不可用' THEN 'R03' WHEN '空号' THEN 'KH' WHEN '关机' THEN 'GJ' WHEN '占线' THEN 'ZX' WHEN '停机' THEN 'R04' WHEN '未接' THEN 'WRJT' WHEN '主叫欠费' THEN 'R05' WHEN '呼损' THEN 'R06' WHEN '黑名单' THEN 'R07' WHEN '线路盲区' THEN 'R08' ELSE t.call_status END) as call_sign, t.call_start_time, t.org_caseNo, t.org_id from t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_temp t WHERE t.import_batch_no = #{importBatchNo} and t.is_exception ='0' AND EXISTS( SELECT a.case_no from t_lc_task a WHERE a.case_no=t.org_caseNo and a.org_id=t.org_id and IFNULL(a.recently_follow_up_date,'0000-00-00 00:00:00') <= t.call_start_time) )tt) n SET m.call_sign = n.call_sign, m.call_sign_value = n.call_status, m.recently_follow_up_date = n.call_start_time WHERE m.org_id = n.org_id and m.case_no = n.org_caseNo
mapper.insert:
insert into t_lc_collectionrecordimprot_flow
id, import_batch_no, org_id, org_name, total, create_by, create_time,
#{id}, #{importBatchNo}, #{orgId}, #{orgName}, #{total}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},
